title: Little Tina Fantasy Land
about_game: Embark on an epic adventure full of whimsy, wonder, and high-powered weaponry! Coming

title: Stifu
about_game: Sifu is an action beat 'em up video game developed and published by French studio Sloclap. Set in modern-day China, players control the child of a martial arts school's sifu who seeks revenge on those responsible for their father's death.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
about_game: Red Dead Redemption 2 is a 2018 action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. The game is the third entry in the Red Dead series and a prequel to the 2010 game Red Dead Redemption

title: Cyberpunk 2077
about_game: Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing video game developed by CD Projekt Red and published by CD Projekt. The story takes place in Night City, an open world set in the Cyberpunk universe.

title: Kena
about_game: Kena: Bridge of Spirits is a 2021 action-adventure video game developed and published by Ember Lab. The story follows Kena, a young spirit guide who uses her magical abilities to help deceased people move from the physical to the spirit world. The game is presented through a third-person perspective.

title: Vampire: The Masquerade
about_game: Vampire was inspired by role-playing games (RPGs) such as Call of Cthulhu, RuneQuest, and Nightlife, as well as the writings of Joseph Campbell and vampire films such as The Lost Boys.

title: Salt and Sacrifice
about_game: A once-peaceful kingdom is plunged into chaos by encroaching tides of Mages: merciless embodiments of elemental chaos. The Marked Inquisitors, a doomed force of the condemned, once again mobilizes to stand against the existential threat of Magic. A buried secret threatens to bring an ancient empire to utter ruin.

title: Jelly Bean Man
about_game: In the early morning of May 17th, @Epic Games Mall official Weibo announced that the popular multiplayer party game “Jelly Bean Man” will be permanently free on all platforms from June 21st, and will be available for the first time on Nintendo Switch, Xbox and Epic game malls.

title: Salt and Sacrifice
about_game: A once-peaceful kingdom is plunged into chaos by encroaching tides of Mages: merciless embodiments of elemental chaos. The Marked Inquisitors, a doomed force of the condemned, once again mobilizes to stand against the existential threat of Magic. A buried secret threatens to bring an ancient empire to utter ruin.

title: Evil Dead: The Game
about_game: Evil Dead: The Game is a 2022 survival horror game based on the Evil Dead franchise. It was developed and published by Saber Interactive. It features co-operative gameplay and player versus player combat.

title: Fortnite
about_game: Fortnite is the completely free online game where you and your friends fight to be the last one standing in Battle Royale

title: Grand Theft Auto V
about_game: Grand Theft Auto V is a vast open world game set in Los Santos, a sprawling sun-soaked metropolis struggling to stay afloat in an era of economic uncertainty and cheap reality TV

title: Insurgency
about_game: Insurgency is a multiplayer tactical first-person shooter video game developed and published by New World Interactive. It is a standalone sequel to Insurgency:

title: Wildcat
about_game: The wildcat is a species complex comprising two small wild cat species: the European wildcat and the African wildcat.

title: Rogue
about_game: Rogue is a dungeon crawling video game by Michael Toy and Glenn Wichman with later contributions by Ken Arnold

title: StarTrek
about_game: James T Kirk, who is the captain of the Starship Enterprise, explores the whole galaxy with his crew and goes on several adventures as they fight evil forces together.

title: Zombie Army
about_game: Sniper Elite is a tactical shooter video game series developed by Rebellion Developments. It is a third-person tactical shooter that emphasises a less direct approach to combat, encouraging the player as a sniper to use stealth and keep distance from enemy soldiers.

title: Dying Light
about_game: Sniper Elite is a tactical shooter video game series developed by Rebellion Developments. It is a third-person tactical shooter that emphasises a less direct approach to combat, encouraging the player as a sniper to use stealth and keep distance from enemy soldiers.
